raw_body: Safe in the arms of Jesus. Retired Registrar of Marriages (Negombo). Beloved wife of the late Patrick Mendis, precious mother of Charmaine, Diana (UK), Prosper (Srilankan Airlines), loving mother-in-law of Freddy, late Joe and Chrishani (Rupavahini), precious Nana of Jonathan, Melanie and Joshua (UK), Enon and Sanduni, Michelle, Shawn, Shenelle and Dion, loving great grandmother of Lilah (UK), beloved sister of the late Damian Perera and Freacy F
